effect.diamond_pearl: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.platinum: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.platinum: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.
flavor_text.platinum: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.
